K10bsu001_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārddhaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ
K10bsu001_u:4: anityā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāsvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ /
K10bsu001_u:5: yadyāvat bhikṣavaḥ sarvebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyo 'laṃ nirvartitumalaṃ viraktamalaṃ vimoktum /
K10bsu001_u:6: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ āmaraṇānta hi jīvita maraṇa paryavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇam /
K10bsu001_u:7: yepi te bhikṣavo gṛhapatayo mahāśālakulā brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulākṣatriya mahāśālakulā
K10bsu001_u:11: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ rājānaḥ kṣatriyāśca murddhābhiṣiktā jānapadai śvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptā mahāntaṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityā vasanti /
K10bsu001_u:12: teṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
K10bsu001_u:13: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ ṛṣayo vānaprasthāḥ pramukta phalāhārāḥ prabhūktaphala bhojinaḥ pramukta phalena yāpanti teṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvita maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
K10bsu001_u:15: paranirmitavaśavartinodevāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇa paryavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
K10bsu001_u:16: yepi te bhikṣavo rūpiṇo devāḥ prathamadhyānalābhino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ
K10bsu001_u:17: dvitīya dhyānalābhina parītābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāśvarā stṛtīyadhyāna lābhinaḥparītaśubhā
K10bsu001_u:18: apramāṇaśubhā śubhakṛtsnā caturthadhyāna lābhinonabhrakā puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā
K10bsu001_u:19: avṛhā atapā sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāścadevāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ
K10bsu001_u:21: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ ārūpiṇodevā ākāśānantaāyatanopagā vijñānantyāyatanopagā ākiṃcanyāyatanopagā
K10bsu001_u:22: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāśca devāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntahi jīvita maraṇaṃ paryavasāna
K10bsu001_u:25: yepi te bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyā apahṛtabhārā anuprāptatvākāthā
K10bsu001_u:28: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ pratyekabuddhā khaḍga viṣāṇakalpā ekamātmāna damayanti ekamātmāna śamayati ekamātmātmānaṃparinirvāyanti teṣāmapi 'yaṃkāyonikṣepaṇadharmaḥ
K10bsu001_u:29: yepi te bhikṣavastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyak saṃbuddhādaśavalavalinaḥudārārṣamāḥsamyak siṃhanādanādineścaturvaiśāradyadharmārohaṇa vaiśāradyaṃ
K10bsu001_u:32: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ kumbhakārakṛtāni bhāṇḍāniśrāmānivāpakvāni va bhedanaparyantāni
K10bsu001_u:33: bhedana paryavasānānyevameva bhikṣavaḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ
K10bsu001_u:34: āmaraṇāntaṃ hi jīvita maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
K10bsu001_u:41: tathā saṃskārajāḥ satvā nityaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ //
K10bsu001_u:44: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca parṣadobhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
